This church features striking brick construction, a material that not only provides durability but also contributes to the aesthetic appeal of the building. 

Visitors will appreciate the intricate details often found in Gothic Revival structures, including pointed arches, elaborate facades, and possibly stained glass windows that allow natural light to dance within the sanctuary.
